attributes.action: Extre support for people with bad eyesight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My eyesight i really bad but is corrected by glaases 12.50 to be exact. I get a measly £12 off my glasses of £150 pounds worth of lenses. Admitedly I get nice frames and i thik that i should pay for style not requirements.

Everybody knows someone with bad eyesight so can everybody sign this petition please.
